articles.title: H-1B visa: US tech sector scrambles in the face of $100,000 fees - BBC
articles.description: Startups and smaller firms could bear the brunt of Trump's new H-1B visa fee, and some fear it could thwart US innovation.
articles.content:

Karen Brady, the chief executive at Ryther, a behavioural health nonprofit, said her sector has been grappling with a workforce shortage - and hiring employees through… [+6209 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Neon, the No. 2 social app on the Apple App Store, pays users to record their phone calls and sells data to AI firms - TechCrunch
articles.description: A new call recording app is gaining traction for offering to pay users for voice data from calls, which is sold to AI companies.
articles.content: A new app offering to record your phone calls and pay you for the audio so it can sell the data to AI companies is, unbelievably, the No. 2 app in Apple’s U.S. App Store’s Social Networking section. … [+6614 chars]

articles.author: Tim De Chant
articles.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM - TechCrunch
articles.description: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.
articles.content: The Trump administration might be fond of calling the energy transition the green new scam, but that isnt stopping it from seeking a significant stake in what promises to be the largest lithium mine … [+1354 chars]
